experienceGenerations: An experience spanning four generations and continuous interaction with consumers guarantees these features. A standout feature of Plasco Mahdi is the direct importation of products by the management, selecting the best items to beautify your home.
associationMembership: Plasco Mahdi is the first household appliances collection in Iran to join the European Specialty Plastic Household Appliances Association in 2007.
foundersPath: The path started by the founders of 'Plasco Mahdi' in the 1940s has now entered a new phase, and we are proud to announce that we obtained the relevant permits in February 2015.
futureGoals: We hope to achieve global standards in quality and product diversity by acquiring up-to-date knowledge in this industry.
storyParagraph1: An experience spanning four generations and continuous interaction with consumers guarantees these features. A standout feature of Plasco Mahdi is the direct importation of products by the management, selecting the best items to beautify your home.
storyParagraph2: Plasco Mahdi is the first specialized collection related to plastic household appliances in Iran, joining the European Specialty Plastic Household Appliances Association in 2007. The collection has undergone many specialized courses related to the processing and production of plastic household appliances in the training workshops of this association and specialized workshops in various fields of plastic household appliances production, particularly in injection molding, in leading countries in this industry like the USA and Germany. Now, with the backing of past achievements and modern technology, Plasco Mahdi has entered the industrial and large-scale production phase of plastic household appliances. We are proud to announce that 'Plasco Mahdi' is now a recognized industrial brand in Iran's plastic household appliances industry, offering high-quality and diverse products to Iranian consumers.
